reviewText: This Hallmark 4 Pack is such a great value and it is so nice to watch movies that are family friendly.  I particularly enjoyed Bridal Fever- it is a fun story but the others good too.  I love watching "The Good Witch" during the fall.  Well done, Hallmark and Amazon!!!
I bought this as a December the 25th gift for a special someone. The set shipped nice and fast. I am certain this gift will not disappoint! Very nice package, thank you!
Great movies!  Maybe not for the youngest, but nice movies for women.  I really only wanted one of the movies.  And found the other 3 quite nice.

The ad said number of discs: 4.
There are only actually 2 discs with a movie on each side.
I ordered because it said 4 discs so therefore I was disappointed.

Loved all 4 movies. Call them chick flicks if you like. Enjoyable and relaxing to watch. No violence and can't remember any cuss words or nudity. Sure, not the best known stars and maybe not the best acting, but enjoyable movies anyway. All great in my opinion.

This movie pack is a must for those who love a good romantic comedy. My favorite is Bridal Fever with the  always wonderful Andrea Roth. She finds the right man, who is not looking for Ms Right but of course changes his mind at the end of the movie. There is the gorgeous Mark Conselos as a firefighter and Catherine Bell as the good witch. For a great day or weekend of romance, this set is a must.

I love the Hallmark Channel and watch their movies whenever I can. However I recently moved to a rural area whose cable provider does not supply Hallmark, I am so greatful to get four movies in one package! These movies are very predictable and extremely feel good. If you enjoy romance, light hearted, feel good movies these are for you. Be forward though that not all movies on this disc come with subtitles (whether in another language or for the hearing impaired) if that's a big deal for you consider this before you purchase. Thanks Hallmark!!!!
No acting ability on any of these movies. Very boring and the storylines weren't any good either. Save your money.
Love Hallmark movies!
Gift for my mother who is a big fan of the hallmark movies.  She loves this one.
Good movies
Great variety of movies!
A+

This was a great deal on four feel-good movies.  It comes with two cds and you have to flip them over.  At first, one cd was defective.  Amazon promptly replaced it.  The second time, it was no problem at all.  I placed the cds in my mac laptop. If they don't play at first, eject and try again.  Great movie selections.  I enjoyed them very much.
I have always loved Hallmark movies.  They have such amazing characters and plots.  I enjoy watching some of my favorite actors and actresses starring in family films.
Everything Just Fine. Will order again !
Great Movies. I really enjoy the value and Amazon Pime
I enjoyed these movies They were heart warming

I only thought two out of four of these drama made for tv movies were half decent. The other two movies not so much. Bridal Fever with Delta Burke, is the one who makes the movie okay to watch. Not overall impressed with these selections on this dvd movie collection. Price for this, is about right. Thank you.
Great movies and a great price.

this movie 4 pack was actually only 2 of the 4 movies.  A rip off...false advertising... i bought this collection the same time i bought 3 other collection's and by the time i got around to watch these movies, the time to return was up.  I won't be buying from this seller again!!!
All expects are excellent as always although, I order that by mistake and is not the fault of Amazon, thanks again.

I really only bought this DVD for the Good Witch all the movies on here are pretty good and I must say I enjoyed them all even though I'd never heard of any of the movies but, the Good Witch. Typical chick flicks but, I enjoyed the plots and I don't make much time for many movies as I'm busy. They're feel good movies so if you want a cute plot and some romantic themes. You will enjoy this and the price was great!
Fun family movies and girls' movies.

These are all worth there own 5 stars , and to have them all on one set is Awsome. Although my 2 favorites are The good witch, and my husband even wanted me to order it even if I'll I got was For the love of Grace. Of course there live on it its Hallmark. But it is a different with such good acting, and the storyline is so good. I live it when you get offered 4 in one!
great product
I'm a very big Hallmark movie fan.  I like that the films are clean and usually very entertaining.

Honestly-------and, I have been known to exaggerate-------I enjoyed all four of these movies. I bought the FOUR follow-up movies (The Good Witch Collection (The Good Witch's Garden / Good Witch's Gift / The Good Witch's Family / The Good Witch's Charm) (Hallmark)) for THE GOOD WITCH. Interesting to see the children grow-up over the years of filming the mini-series. The Collection [with movies #2-5] is cheaper than buying them [$10, each] individually. I applaud the idea of "J-U-S-T" having the movies NOT in this collection, reviewed here. The first three "GOOD WITCH"es're in a crisp 2-channel Digital Stereo; the last two're in, interesting, 5.1 Surround Sound. PERFECT video[s], and audio! HIGHLY recommended, family films, for children of all ages. "Mike" age 66

First, I would like to thank the kind person who left a "non-review" breaking down each movie. That information is good info. When I read a review, I am looking for information. With a Hallmark selection, it is a given that the movie will be appropriately rated for all people and that is why I have so many. That said, I enjoyed all four of the movies. Each had its own little flavor and each movie does bring to mind feelings of love, charity, grace, and faith. They are good entertainment and very low budget for those of us who don't think that a good movie should cost 20 or 30 dollars.

Great for family movie nights. Some reviewers hated the language or the violence, but it's nothing compared to what you see on TV every day now. Most stories have redeeming social value. Video quality is reasonable for such a highly compressed disk.
Great way to see movies economically.

I've watched two of the movies on these dvds and enjoyed them. I cann't wait to see the other two.
Nice collection of touching and entertaining movies.  A great addition for the movies I love to watch again and again.

I really like any movie with john Schneider.  and the good witch show is good too.they r my favorite shows.

Hallmark movie 4  pack is wonderful. I love movies that are great!! Proves you can have great movies with NO bad language, rated G and PG. Thanks!! You Rock Hallmark!
Great collection with super sweet romantic movies.  If you don't mind a little cheese - they are a great group of movies - for a girl's night or family friendly.

I almost Always love Hallmark Movies .It saddens Me That there are a few made Now that have Language in Them that takes away from the "Family" or the Theme is going More & More Into a "SINGLE PARENT " House Holds  I guess there are so many divorces now It is something that has to be recognized. Especially,the Christmas Shows!  As I said I Love Hallmarks Christmas the Best & Always have! I enjoy so much this policy !They Made 13 New  Movies  This past Christmas coming out with Several Stories on ONE DVD!They usually won't put the 2013 on DVD until It is about 2 years later !  I Already have purchased 2 of These DVD's  of these DVD Movies have 2 of these Stories on DVD already ,  I can give them to Someone who doesn't have a copy ! It takes Up Less Space which is an advantage to Me. The Movies are Full Length(nothing Cut Out!) I enjoy watching a DVD Now more than the TV version JUST because of All the Advertisements( Especially the last 1/2 Hour Before the Movie is completed! My Dad said When We First had to go with cable ,That was their Reason for purchasing  "Cable" was to of the channels already !Of Course We have Many many more Channels to watch ! That isn't why I am enjoying these ideas  ! I hope They Continue this Way doing More of these !  Even if They are more costly,To Me it's worthi t!
4 pack is great entertainment. Would like to get 4 apck of all 4 GOOD WITCH movies!!  I am a fan of good movies via CD.
These are wonderful movies which I have seen numerous times on TV and now I will be able to enjoy them whenever I feel like it. Quick delivery which is always great.
Cheaper than buying them apart. Good witch is awesome!! Can't wait until they all come out on dvd. Yeah Baby!
4 pack movies only received 2, very disapointed. The movie was great thougt but missing The Good Witch and Come Dance of my Wedding.
These movies are just what I expected. Wonderfully romantic  and happy endings. just what I wanted to watch during cold winter months in Iceland....
I enjoy watching movies on the Hallmark tv station and I know these movies will not let me down.  I will enjoy them.
Good assortment of humour and drama.  I enjoyed it. They were nice movies but not exceptional.  Nice for a relaxing evening.
Great feel good movies, my wife loves them, she bought a few more for presents, and she got great feedback.

I've watched 2 of the movies & thoroughly enjoyed them both.  As usual, Hallmark delivers with entertaining & heart-warming stories...very enjoyable watching.  I was thrilled to get these movies in a 4-pack, especially at the price -- a fantastic bargain!

Great date night viewing, all movies spiced with romance. The story lines have just the right recipe to satisfy your happy ending movie cravings. Pop the popcorn and gather 'round. Choose one from the main menu, or make time to sample them all. Each movie is tastefully done. Enjoy them.

I love most Hallmark movies, so why not get 4 of the best in one package.  I had no problems with the dvds . They are excellent. I recommend these movies to anyone who likes romance and happy endings.
I like a disc with many movies so I don't have to get up and change it all the time.  Currently we do not have satellite TV since it is so expensive so all I watch are old sitcoms and movies.
My husband and I enjoyed all four movies.  They are good clean family movies that we can watch with our grandkids.
One of the movies I didn't care about, I don't do witchcraft in anything, The good witch could be changed.
DVD's are in good shape and play as expected.  Packaging was in good shape and without damage.  Three more words.
This films are good fun-they are easy to watch and could be watched as a family-some interesting twists in the plots etc-would recommend-
Hallmark does a great job on this genre of movies.  Light, fun and sweet.  Fun movies to watch over and over.

This is a collection of four very nice stories.  My favorite is "For the love of Grace ".  I watch it over and over again because it is a story of compassion, of love, and true feelings of people who hae disasters turn into happy endings.  The other three stories are also very nicely done, easy to watch and enjoy.  Hallmark Hall of Fame movies are always uplifting with no violence, obscene language, or explicit sex.  Good family viewing.
Welll worth the money for family entertainment. 13 more words are required and I don't have a clue as to what to say.

We were very disappointed that every movie had a vibration in the picture all the way through. The content of the movies was great. The product was faulty! Very disappointed when we sat down to enjoy a family night:(
Great movies in this Hallmark 4 movie collection too! I never get tired of watching Hallmark movies. A great way to watch Hallmark movies without TV service.
When I watched "Come Dance At My  Wedding" I got to the last part and the disc was faulty and I missed a good deal of it.

I was surprised with the movies on this dvd.
I enjoyed all the movies and look forward to watching them again.
This is well worth the money, Its nice to get 4 for one. the movies are good and clean, which are hard to find.

These four movies especially Bridal Fever were so entertaining and light.  These four movies are not so serious but do address things like prejudice, death and grieving, forgiveness especially long held feelings of bitterness and remorse.  The resolutions of problems from the past or present in these stories was practical and realistic.

The price was perfect for me and they provided hours of relaxation and entertainment on lazy evenings at home.
We love the Hallmark movies.  The 4 pack was bought at a very good price and we enjoyed all four movies.
This is a good deal.  The movies are enjoyable and you get 4 fo rthe prices of one.  These are Hallmark so there is always a good family safe viewing.  Great for young girls and young at heart girls.
All of the movies contained in this one package are great on their own.  So great to have all four together!  Family friendly chick-flicks!

I bought this item only because I LOVE the Good Witch series and it was cheaper than buying the dvd by itself. Being a lover off Hallmark Original Movies, I watched the other 3 films included and am very pleased. All films were god quality and I would watch all of these again. I just wish Hallmark would release the other Good Witch films on DVD!
I previously saw these movies on the Hallmark channel and loved them; the price was right so I decided, why not! Lovely family shows.
I only new one out of the three titles, but knowing it's Hallmark...I'm sure to love them as well. I can't wait to view them.
WHY WOULD ANYONE SELLING DVD'S SELL DVD MOVIES NOT BUT IN SUBTITLES. MANY PEOPLE ARE HARD OF HEARING OR STUDING ENGLISH AND SUBTITLES ARE VERY IMPORTANT.
I really enjoy Hallmark movies and these were very good..I like movies with good morals and values in them. It is wonderful to find a lot of the Hallmark movies on Amazon and at a great price.
These are four good Hallmark, high quality family films. No bad language. Nice feel good plots that are well preformed.
All 4 of the hallmark movies are enjoyable and heartwarming.  A good watch.  All 4 have good stories without being over the top mushy.

I've seen all the movies before on television except Bridal Fever. I am most disappointed in the DVD because since  they were Hallmark movies they should be close captioned.  The notice on Hallmark states their movies have been close captioned since 1990.
Hallmark also posted that close captioning is part of the filming process.  So why is close captioning removed when I buy a DVD from Amazon.  I really could not rate this movie because I cannot hear it and there is no close captioning so I can't read what is being said.
Love the movies but it will not finish playing on any of the movies. It quits before it gets to the end. I blame it being on both sides. would not buy movies this way again. Waste of money
the best move in the pack was The Good Witch. The others were just ok. I did enjoy them and found nothing wrong with any of them.
Hallmark provides some very fine movies for families and are the kind of entertainment that is worth watching more than once.
It is very refreshing to watch a movie that is clean and wholesome. A movie that you don't have to worry if your children come into the room while you are watching it.
I had viewed 3 of these movies on TV and enjoyed them.  A star of the 4th is one of my favorites.  I will watch these movies many times when there is nothing on TV that I want to watch
Four "feel good" movies, well worth the cost.  This is the kind of entertainment the entire can watch, especially when there is nothing good on TV.
I love all these movies.  I love romance movies that have a good plot.  All of these plots were very different also which keeps them interesting.

something for everyone and a good lesson in each movie. Fun, good family situations and
something to take away from each
All of these movies are on my favorite list.  I enjoy watching them over and over.  I can even pop my own popcorn when I watch them.
Delightful stories. Good acting and story's were above average. The acting was very good and the scenery was wonderful. I was moved by two of the movies.
We look for a variety family friendly movies we can enjoy. We had seen the Good Witch, and wanted it, so we got a bargain getting the 3 additional movies.

All these are typically in Hallmark style and enjoyable.  I think my favorable is Come Dance at my Wedding and the close second is For the Love of Grace.  All very nice romantic stories with happy endings!  What more can you ask more.
Gave these as a gift and have not heard of any complaints on them from the person I gave them to.
Great movies  something to relax and enjoy with out the guns fighting and noise Like that I can pick which movie to watch
I haven't had a chance to watch the movies yet, but I like the value of getting 4 movies in one for a great price.
Was a good purchase, my wife liked it a lot and was happy with it as a birthday gift.  Would reccomend.
You can't beat the price - 4 movies for the price of one!  I enjoyed each of the movies in the 4 pack set.
Just another set to add to my collection. Sometimes when there is nothing worth watching on the 100 or so channels I have on cable (smiles) I watch these to make me smile

I bought this item for two of the movies: For the Love of Grace and Come Dance at my Wedding. I have seen both on TV several times and like them very much. I plan on watching Bridal Fever soon. I'm not sure of The Good Witch.  As a Christian I have some issues with certain occult subjects which are presented as other than skills or gifts from God. I have to read some reviews of this movie before I decide to view it.

I liked all the movies, they are good clean movies.
What I Did For Love was exellent  My spelling is not good.  I loved the movies.

I love this DVD the four movies are great I can watch one at a time and over & over. I love most Hallmark movies they are all so hart warming. I would recomend this to my friends because most love Hallmark.

Use they movie to put in a gift basket for benefit. They were greatly appreciated. Added the popcorn bucket and popcorn with candy:-)

I've watched these movies on the Hallmark Channel and love them all.
This made a very nice Valentine's gift for a family member. And at a great price! The price is amazing!
Four good movies for the price of one.  A great deal, great service, and 4 good movies.  How can u lose.
I liked 2 of the movies and 2 of them were just OK for me.  I still got my moneys worth and would still buy them like this in the future.
I enjoyed the movies in this dvd pack!  If you love Hallmark movies, then this is a must buy dvd!

Come Dance at my Wedding is a heartwarming story of acceptance of what you can not change and moving on.  For the Love of Grace is about not forgetting the past but moving on and accepting the future.  Briday Fever is a litte crazy but still cute and Good Witch is different.  It is a great price for four movies.
Arrived as promised and movies watch so far have been enjoyed by all...great for family viewing, as are all the Hallmark movies I have purchased to date.
This has some cute Hallmark movies. Enjoyed watching all of them. Sure cant beat these bundle dvds for the prices.
Fun, happily-ever-after movies with enjoyable story lines and acting.  I will watch them over and over.  Wholesome entertainment for whole family.

Very nicely put together movies...love all of them...if you know Hall mark .... you'll love these as well to.
very good too.
these packs are a bargain,but sometimes I repeat some films that I have ordered as a single, but I guess that is my fault..
I love romance and this was just my cup of tea. Any of the movies were new for me. Very good buy

all and on one disc.  Makes more room to buy more.
My wife and I enjoyed all the movies. This is a great 4 pack of romantic shows. Hallmark you did it again.
We done get hallmark on inverse so this was a great option. Delivery was quick. There were 4 movies on two disks so I was confused at first but I got to see all four movies. Loved them.
I'm a romatic at heart but also exclectic in my viewing choices.  This fits the bill.  I especially love "For the Love Grace"...
This is a great buy for a ladies movie night. My sisters and I enjoyed them all. I would recommend it.
Two of these movies we watch on netflix on our Roku netstreaming box fairly often. As this is a gift the package is unopened but I imagine we'll love these too!

Hallmark movies are the best. I Loved these movies and I know you will too. John Schneider was excellent in Come Dance at my Wedding. The good witch is the first of a series of movies that are really excellent.

This is not really a review. I just wished to add this information about the four movies included in this collection. I hope it is useful.

Bridal Fever (2008) - TV Movie - 88 min - Romance - Director: Ron Oliver - Stars: Andrea Roth, Delta Burke and Gabriel Hogan.

The Good Witch (2008) - TV Movie - 89 min - Family / Fantasy - Director: Craig Pryce - Stars: Catherine Bell, Chris Potter and Catherine Disher.

For the Love of Grace (2008) - TV Movie - 88 min - Drama / Romance - Director: Craig Pryce - Stars: Mark Consuelos, Chandra West and Corbin Bernsen.

Come Dance at My Wedding (2009) - TV Movie - 85 min - Drama - Director: Mark Jean - Stars: John Schneider, Brooke Nevin and Roma Downey.

my wife says the moves are great

So when I saw this with 4 shows I loved I had to add it to my collection. My only wish is that they included the digital copies so I could access them in my Amazon prime account.
